name: Presidential Debate Data
desc: Using the transcript to analyze the lexical, tonal, and topical patterns of the first Presidential debate of 2024!

name: Analyzing Music
desc: A combination of some Soundcloud & Genius scraping and a bit of Textblob to analyze what each artist's audeince values!

name: College Datasets
desc: Turning college Common Data Sets into a fun and interactive comparison dashboard to help high schoolers make their lists!

name: Sports and Crime
desc: Answering the age old question of whether sports games really do cause more violence through Baltimore and the Baltimore Ravens!

name: AI Premier League Bot
desc: A (currently) unfinished project that involved scraping a ton of data and hopefully training a bot that can outperform me on FPL!
